SEARCH
Package controller

Class Hand

java.lang.Object
controller.Hand
public class Hand extends Object
Contains methods to calculate the value of a hand, take cards from a deck and discard the hand to a deck.
Author:
Michael Neuper michael@michaelneuper.com
